summary: MY CAR IS LEAKING GAS AND I. CAN ONLY PUT 20 OR 30 DOLLARS WORTH IN AT A TIME  WHERE MOST OF IT ENDS UP ON THE GROUND. THERE IS ALSO A VERY STRONG GAS SMELL. I'M TAKING IT IN TO BE FIXED BUT THIS IS OBVIOUSLY A PROBLEM SINCE I JUST READ THAT OTHER OWNERS ARE HAVING THIS PROBLEM SO THERE SHOULD BE A RECALL BEFORE SOMEONE IS SERIOUSLY HURT MY CHECK ENGINE LIGHT ALSO COMES ON FOR A WHILE AND THEN GOES OFF. THESE ARE PROBLEMS THAT REQUIRE A RECALL.  *TR
